specialRules.hint: This unit’s shooting attacks always ignore cover King’s Will: If the hero is part of a unit of Mummies, Skeletons, Skeleton Guard or Skeleton Knights, then that unit counts as having Quality 3+.
specialRules.name: Cursed Arrows
specialRules.label: Cursed Arrows
specialRules.description: This unit’s shooting attacks always ignore cover King’s Will: If the hero is part of a unit of Mummies, Skeletons, Skeleton Guard or Skeleton Knights, then that unit counts as having Quality 3+.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which can’t be regenerated.
specialRules.name: Undead
specialRules.label: Undead
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which can’t be regenerated.

spells.name: Blade Curse
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Storm of Skulls
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protection
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it’s wounded.

spells.name: Desiccation
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Smiting
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately charge by up to 6” and gets +1 to hit for that melee.

spells.name: Vengeance
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” must take a morale test. If failed it takes 1 automatic hit per model.
